title: Inflation rate of the main industrialized and emerging countries 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This chart shows the Inflation rate main industrialized the Inflation of rate they 've had .
\n It shows Russia has had 4.68 rate , Brazil has had the Inflation at 0.99 rate , India has had 3.44 , China has had 2.31 , USA has had the most rate at 4.68 and Japan has had 0.99 rate .
gold: This statistic shows the inflation rate of the main industrialized and emerging countries in 2019 . In 2019 , the inflation rate in China was estimated to amount to approximately 2.31 percent compared to the previous year .
